choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
Here is a healthy meal plan for you that avoids the specified allergens and restrictions:

Monday:
Breakfast - Overnight oats with chia seeds (made without dairy)
Lunch - Quinoa salad with grilled vegetables, chickpeas, and a lemon-tahini dressing
Dinner - Baked tofu with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli
Snack - Fresh fruit or mixed nuts (excluding almonds, pistachios, cashews)

Tuesday:
Breakfast - Gluten-free oatmeal with berries and a splash of apple cider vinegar
Lunch - Lentil soup with crusty whole grain bread
Dinner - Grilled chicken or vegetable stir-fry with brown rice
Snack - Roasted nuts (excluding almonds, pistachios, cashews) or air-popped popcorn seasoned with herbs and spices

Wednesday:
Breakfast - Scrambled eggs with spinach and a side of whole grain toast
Lunch - Chickpea and avocado salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and a lemon-tangerine dressing
Dinner - Baked salmon with roasted asparagus and quinoa
Snack - Hummus with carrot sticks or sliced cucumber (excluding honey)

Thursday:
Breakfast - Smoothie made with spinach, banana, almond milk (or another non-dairy milk), and a scoop of vanilla protein powder
Lunch - Whole grain wrap filled with roasted vegetables, mixed greens, and a dollop of guacamole
Dinner - Grilled shrimp or tofu kebabs with bell pepper, onion, and zucchini, served with cauliflower rice and a lemon-tahini sauce
Snack - Sliced cucumber with dill tzatziki (made without yogurt) or sliced apple with almond butter

Friday:
Breakfast - Green smoothie made with spinach, kale, banana, non-dairy milk, and a scoop of chocolate protein powder
Lunch - Lentil or vegetable stir-fry over brown rice
Dinner - Grilled portobello mushrooms or tempeh with roasted Brussels sprouts and quinoa
Snack - Roasted nuts (excluding almonds, pistachios, cashews) or air-popped popcorn seasoned with herbs and spices

Saturday:
Breakfast - Chia seed pudding made without dairy, topped with fresh fruit and a drizzle of agave nectar (or another non-honey sweetener)
Lunch - Whole grain wrap filled with roasted vegetables, mixed greens, and a dollop of guacamole
Dinner - Baked cod or tofu with steamed green beans and quinoa
Snack - Sliced cucumber with dill tzatziki (made without yogurt) or sliced apple with almond butter

Sunday:
Breakfast - Overnight oats with chia seeds (made without dairy), topped with fresh fruit and a drizzle of agave nectar (or another non-honey sweetener)
Lunch - Quinoa salad with grilled vegetables, chickpeas, and a lemon-tahini dressing
Dinner - Baked tofu or tempeh with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli
